name: msccss
description: A collection of basic SCSS utilities for grid, flexbox, positioning, text and more.
author: Yassine Gallaoui

scripts.build: npm run sass-build scss/main.scss dist/main.min.css && npm run sass-build scss/utils/_base.scss dist/base.min.css && npm run sass-build scss/utils/_flex.scss dist/flex.min.css && npm run sass-build scss/utils/_spacing.scss dist/spacing.min.css && npm run sass-build scss/utils/_text.scss dist/text.min.css
